name: Vault Jumpsuit (Fallout) LoRA
description:
Vault Jumpsuit from Fallout series by Bethesda Game Studios. (Mainly based on Vault 111 Jumpsuit)

Works better with lower CFG vaules (3-6).

Recommended weight range is around 0.35-0.65 depending on the model and CFG vaule.

Weight could be reduced when using SD upscale or certain img2img actions.

**Model should know 'with pipboy3000' ; 'without pipboy3000' and regular 'pipboy3000' prompt, some extras such as 'leather armored' ; 'laserrifle' and 'gauss rifle' to some degree.

**extra propts are currently quite buggy and might not work properly, will require further improvements.

Example promts; full body shot of a man wearing vaultsuit in a forest / a man with a beard wearing vaultsuit without pipboy3000, standing next to a bridge / a woman wearing vaultsuit with pipboy3000 in a ruined city / back shot of a woman wearing vaultsuit without pipboy3000 in a post apocalyptic desert.

Extra Info:

Dataset for the model was around 64 pictures including in game screenshots from my heavily modded FO4 and some pictures from the web and manually captioning images.

Released as an alpha, i will try to improve it further on my free time.

Zovya's RPG v3 was used for the pictures.

If you want to support my work, buy me a coffee!
